sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Creates empty location record for all the service items which doesn't have any service item location record.</description>
        <name>Create empty service item loc records</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[createEmptyServiceItemLocationRecords();

function createEmptyServiceItemLocationRecords() {

    try {

        var result = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().action('sn_wsd_case.create_empty_service_item_loc_records').inBackground().run();

    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.getMessage();
        gs.error(message);
    }

}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-12-22 09:21:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>afd2668ec3e40110547e3810a840dd58</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Create empty service item loc records</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_afd2668ec3e40110547e3810a840dd58</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-22 11:28:42</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Create empty service item loc records
